title: y the new patch 6.21 is not installing/updating... i got stuck....
body:
i m facing a big problem now.. the new patch is not installing at all.. not only me but all my friends in EUNE.. can anyone tell me what should i do.. i even downloaded the Hextech Repair Tool.. but nothing happened.. suggestion pls... the r saying ' unspecific error occured. pls check my log for more info' .... but what i should i check for???? pls help me..
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: The issue may differ depending on when you're getting the error.  On the top right you should see a % of the process.  What % are you receiving this error?  Let me know!
